name: BlockSK8
description:
This is a fun 3D puzzle-solving platformer made with Armory 3D. Collect enough coins to open up doors and look for secret paths and some easter eggs!

Controls:

  • W/Up/Space: Jump
  • A/Left: Move left
  • S/Down: Reorient
  • D/Right: Move right
  • P:Play music
  • M: Mute music

Share this game with https://blocksk8.page.link/gg.

Is the game not playing, slow, or crashing? Go to https://blocksk8.page.link/lite for the lightweight version.
